item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2023
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma After giving my talk (PEP Talk) at North Bay Python in July 2023, I went to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream in Downtown Petaluma for a Lavender Ice cream. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81) Here’s where you can find Angela’s Organic Ice Cream:

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2018
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma One perk of being a keynote at North Bay Python is you get to headline and have your name up on the marquee ‚≠êÔ∏è It’s really cool! Thanks North Bay Python for inviting me! I get to immortalize it in my ice cream selfie üòù Little did I know that I would return to the conference, and back to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream five years later!
